https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bfZcqtEXjPQt0e4sDTXCSXjPtdr.jpg Ukraine's capital, Kyiv, is enduring indiscriminate bombing. With Russian forces attempting to encircle the city, it's a time marked of both deep despair and deep defiance for the residents of Kyiv. Despair and Defiance: The Battle for Ukraine
